relation.text: 1795 . My Dear Sister , As you did not chuse
deposited in my Charter Chest N o . 2 , where it now
occasioned my puzzle . Hitherto , we have had a most delightful Winter
Eight Years old , & having been , by his Mother s
s Wife who is both handsome , & rational , which , in these days
hope till the 6 th - of March
